short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Count Words and count letters of selected text in your browser. Wordcount for highlighted text on your webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Word Counter to add a wordcount function in chrome. This feature enables counting words and letters on a web page. Just highlight text and click the WordCounter icon.
